events.text: I’m blessed to have such a brilliant son… he has it in him to become one of the greats in the hard sciences.
With his aptitude for mathematics he could do anything! Physics, engineering, you name it.
As his parent, I would be neglecting my duties if I didn’t nurture his talent. You agree too, no?
He’s doing his homework right now, perhaps assisting him in math would be a good idea…
